title: 变更历史记录
description:
select * from Pro_ChangeApplyInfo where ProjectID='1710'

select distinct * from Pro_CalculateBasicInfo where ProChangeID in (
'441',
'580',
'581',
'582',
'583',
'586')

select * from Pro_QuoteBasicInfo 

select * from Pro_QuoteDetail

select QuoteID,ProjectQuoteTax,TaxRate 
--into #quoteprice_temp
from Pro_QuoteDetail where QuoteID='12102'

drop table #quoteprice_temp

select
a.ProjectID,
a.ProChangeID,
d.ContractCode,
a.ChangeType,
a.ChangeTypeChild,
c.*,
e.CostTotalPrice
from Pro_ChangeApplyInfo a --变更申请
inner join Pro_QuoteBasicInfo b --报价
on a.ProChangeID=b.ChangeID
inner join #quoteprice_temp c --报价明细
on b.BidID=c.QuoteID
inner join Con_ContractProRel d --合同项目关系
on a.ProjectID=d.ProjectID
inner join Pro_CalculateBasicInfo e --成本
on a.ProChangeID=e.ProChangeID
where d.ContractCode='MSC20180119002'

title: 成本入账时根据合同SPL匹配成本中心
